definitions.definition: A rod, wire, or other structure for receiving or transmitting radio, television signals etc.
A move, as in dancing or skateboarding, involving one or both feet leaving the ground.
Living or taking place in the air.
definitions.example: The seabirds put on an astonishing aerial display.

definitions.definition: Made up of air or gas; gaseous.

definitions.example: The aerial photographs clearly showed the damage caused by the storm.

definitions.definition: Pertaining to the air or atmosphere; atmospheric.
Pertaining to a vehicle which travels through the air; airborne; relating to or conducted by means of aircraft.
